channel.title: Authors on Landfried
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Landfried

item.description: With several colleagues, we are working hard to lay the foundations of an interdisciplinary social sciences research center in Latin America. I am currently finishing a PhD in Computer Science, developing the Computational Social Science area in one of the main scientific centers of the southern hemisphere. As a Social Anthropologist, I am leading a large group of young anthropologists, who have already begun to train in mathematics and computational science.
